titles.title: To impose sanctions with respect to the Government of Georgia if the President determines that the Government of Georgia is taking actions to undermine commitments or contractual agreements with United States persons engaging in business operations in the country of Georgia, and for other purposes.
Georgian Fair Business Practices Sanctions Act of 2019
Georgian Fair Business Practices Sanctions Act of 2019
Georgian Fair Business Practices Sanctions Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.
